column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Toph says : " Somebody 's a little light on his feet !
#Text=" Toph says : " There you are !
#Text=" Aang says : " Please , listen !
#Text=I need an earthbending teacher , and I think it 's supposed to be you !
#Text=" Toph says : " Whoever you are , just leave me alone .
#Text=" Aang says : " Wait !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Way to go , champ !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 've got to admit , now I 'm really glad I bought this bag .
#Text=It matches the belt , perfectly .
#Text=" Katara says : " That is a big relief .
#Text=" Aang says : " If we want to find the Blind Bandit , the Earthbending Academy is a great place to start .
#Text=" Male student says : " Oh great , you again .
#Text=" Katara says : " Yeah , I did n't think so .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Nicely done .
#Text=" Male student says : " Hey !
#Text=You 're that kid who beat the Blind Bandit !
#Text=" Aang says : " We need to talk to her .
#Text=Do you guys know where she lives ?
#Text=" Male student says : " The Blind Bandit 's a mystery .
#Text=She shows up to fight , then disappears .
#Text=" Katara says : " Let me handle this .
#Text=You 're not telling us everything !
#Text=" Male student # 2 says : " No , no , I - I swear it 's true .
#Text=No one knows where she goes , or who she really is .
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's because we 're asking about the wrong person .
#Text=In my vision , I saw a girl , in a white dress , with a pet flying boar .
#Text=Know anybody like that ?
#Text=" Male student says : " Well , a flying boar is the symbol of the Beifong family .
#Text=They 're the richest people in town .
#Text=Probably the whole world .
#Text=" Male student # 2 says : " Yeah , but they do n't have a daughter .
#Text=" Aang says : " A flying boar is good enough for me .
#Text=Let 's check it out .
#Text=" Male student says : " Yeah , you better leave .
#Text=" Katara says : " Hey , I got my eye on you .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Water Tribe .
#Text=" The Boulder says : " I 'm telling you , The Boulder was standing right there .
#Text=I saw the kid strike , but there was no earthbending .
#Text=Nothing made contact .
#Text=The Blind Bandit just fell out of the ring .
#Text=She must 've took a dive and split the money with the kid .
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " Nobody cheats Xin Fu .
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's the flying boar from my vision .
#Text=Come on !
#Text=" Toph says : " What are you doing here , Twinkle Toes ?!
#Text=" Aang says : " How did you know it was me ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Do n't answer to Twinkle Toes , it 's not manly !
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're the one whose bag matches his belt .
#Text=" Toph says : " How did you find me ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , a crazy king told me I had to find an earthbender who listens to the earth .
#Text=And then I had a vision in a magic swamp , and - " Katara says : " What Aang is trying to say is , he 's the Avatar .
#Text=And if he does n't master earthbending soon , he wo n't be able to defeat the Fire Lord .
#Text=" Toph says : " Not my problem .
#Text=Now , get out of here , or I 'll call the guards .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Look , we all have to do our part to win this war , and yours is to teach Aang earthbending .
#Text=" Toph says : " Guards !
#Text=Guards , help !
#Text=" Guard says : " Toph , what happened ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I ... thought I heard someone .
#Text=I got scared .
#Text=" Guard says : " You know your father does n't want you wandering the grounds without supervision , Toph .
#Text=" Lao says : " I 'm pleased to hear that Toph 's private lessons are going well .
#Text=But I want to be sure she 's not trying anything too dangerous .
#Text=" Yu says : " Absolutely not .
#Text=I am keeping her at a beginner 's level .
#Text=Basic forms and breathing exercises only .
#Text=" Lao says : " Very good .
#Text=" Servant says : " Excuse me , sir , but you have a visitor .
#Text=" Lao says : " Who thinks they are so important they can just come to my home unannounced ?
#Text=" Servant says : " Uh ... the Avatar , sir .
#Text="
